item.title: 43 states under cold weather alerts, blizzard warning in parts of Texas
item.description: A storm is bringing the first-ever blizzard warning issued for Beaumont, Texas, and Lake Charles and Lafayette, Louisiana.

item.title: Trump admin to acknowledge only a personâ€™s gender assigned at birth, officials say
item.description: President Donald Trump is set to issue a slew of executives actions on his first day in office Monday that would affect transgender Americans.

item.title: Fire chief shot and killed after stopping to help driver who hit deer with their car
item.description: A fire chief in Alabama has been shot and killed after he stopped to help a driver who had hit a deer with their vehicle, police said.

item.title: Trump inauguration live updates: First pardoned Jan. 6 rioters released in D.C.
item.description: Two Pennsylvania brothers arrested for their role in the riots were released in Washington, D.C. on Monday night.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
